biotools.summary: MARome is a resource for annotation of Scaffold and Matrix Attachment Regions (S/MARs) in Human Genome such as associated genes, genomic region, associated S/MAR binding proteins, associated Retroviral Integration sites for HIV and HTLV (Source: RID) etc. MARome is interlinked to other genomic resources such as, UCSC Genome Browser (For visualization of S/MAR genomic location), ensemble, NCBI-Gene.
